RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 40. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLLYS SUPER STAR broke in full stride to set all the pace and drew clear in the stretch under mild urging. CABARET FLEUR stalked the pace through the turn, had a mild rally in the five path and finished second best. APPALACHIAN SPIRIT unhurried early, found her best stride late along the rail. SUPER SCAMP was bumped at the start, trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals along the inside. SHE'S A SOLDIER failed to menace. BOLD NICKY broke inward bumping SUPER SCAMP at the start, chased the winner into the stretch then weakened. EXTRA CRAFTY had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Super Scamp
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, passed tiring rivals inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Nicky
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke inward, bumped start, chased, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Hollys Super Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Cabaret Fleur
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, mild rally 5path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Extra Crafty
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Appalachian Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Clark Rick Clark Brent W Wolfe Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late rail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weigh t Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TALE OF THE LYON stalked the early pace, rallied three wide through the turn to make the lead at the top of the stretch, set the balance of the pace and drew clear under left then right handed urging. JETTIN PEGASUS unhurried early, rallied through the stretch five wide and got up for second. SUSHI Q sped to the lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside for a half then was outfinished. CHECK OUT LINE went evenly. CAT'S RHYTHM failed to menace. APPEALING SENORITA pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then gave way late.

ENTRY.NAME: Jettin Pegasus
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, late rally, 5 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Sushi Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace half, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Tale of the Lyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide turn, drew clear, right urging

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Paul W. Schaffer, William D. Pickerrell& Pick View LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Cat's Rhythm
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Check Out Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pre ferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOODLAND WALK broke well to press the pace two wide into the turn, took charge nearing the quarter pole then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best under confident handling. ENZOEXPRESS away alertly, set a pressured pace inside the winner for nearly a half then then was no match while well clear for second. SAVVY LAYLA was taken outside soon after the start, raced six wide down the backstretch, had a mild late rally through the stretch two wide and finished best of the rest. PARKER well placed inside, went evenly. OVERBEARING failed to menace. GILLIGAN was no threat. CHIC N WILBUR had brief speed. D'MONEY HONEY was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Enzoexpress
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace turn, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Woodland Walk
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, took over 1/4p, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Parker
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Chic N Wilbur
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Overbearing
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: D'money Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Savvy Layla
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6 wide backstretch, mild rally, 2 wide lane, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Gilligan
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weigh t Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SARAH JANE prompted the early pace along the inside, dropped back a bit on the turn, altered course three wide a the top of the stretch, rallied determinedly through the final stages under a strong hand ride and got up in the final strides. DANCIN' ROSIE set a pressured pace two wide into the turn, gave up the advantage before a half, regained the lead in upper stretch, shook clear late and just missed hanging on. WHERETHERE'SSMOKE pressed the pace three wide into the turn, made the lead before a half, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was outfinished. CATABOUT trailed into the stretch and had a mild rally late in the four path. NOT A WILD BRAT failed to menace. J J'S FANCY close up three wide, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Catabout
ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally late 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Sarah Jane
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, altered course 3 wide top lane, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Wild Brat
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Wherethere'ssmoke
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3 wide, led turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Dancin' Rosie
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide, shook clear inside, caught

ENTRY.NAME: J J's Fancy
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 3 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE MORE RING unhurried early, responded under mild right handed urging in upper stretch, circled rivals five wide and was along in time under a hand ride. QUANTUM THEORY vied for the early lead four wide, rallied three wide through the turn to make the lead in upper stretch, shook clear before the furlong marker then couldn't handle the winner. RIKIO settled close up three wide, shifted out to the five path entering the turn, offered a mild bid three wide approaching the top of the stretch then was outfinished. FIVE STAR PHIL trailed down the backstretch then finished with good courage inside rivals. BOSS BEAR was no factor. HOUSEBUILDER had good early speed along the inside and was through after a half. FRANK N DUCKY away alertly, set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch then weakened. UPTOWN GUY chased the early pace two wide and faltered in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Housebuilder
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, faltered lane

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Rikio
ENTRY.OWNER: Burnsworth Richard and Ultra Championship Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: close 3 wide, angled 5path turn, drew closer 1/4 pole,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Quantum Theory
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P Burnsworth Richard and Buyea Kristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4 wide, rallied 2 wide, turn, led lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Five Star Phil
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, finished well inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Frank N Ducky
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: One More Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried circled 5 wide right handed urging, in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCKEYE RED away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under confident handling to win going away. HARSH TRUTH unhurried for a half, had a mild rally in the five path through the stretch and finished clear for second. WHISKEY HELPS trailed into the stretch and found his best stride late in the seven path. GOOD MUSIC chased the winner three wide into the stretch then faded. HAPPY TAKEOVER failed to menace. KING PATRIOT chased the winner two wide until deep stretch then weakened. NOSEY POWER well placed, failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Nosey Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: King Patriot
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Helps
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, best stride late 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Takeover
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Good Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Harsh Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, late rally, 5path, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 38. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WINDY VALLEY away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under left handed urging to win as much the best while being ridden out. SMARTASSET stalked pace the early pace, offered a mild bid three wide into the stretch and finished second best. DOMINUS O'S ME chased the winner three then two wide into the stretch, dropped inside and was outfinished for second. J. P INDY failed to menace. SHE'S A BIG GIRL was no threat. MI CANCION vied for the lead along the inside into the far turn then gave way.

ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Big Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off, much the best, ridden out,

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, 3 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KACHOW broke in full stride to set all the pace and widened through the stretch under a strong hand ride to win as much the best. KATERYNA stalked the pace down the backstretch, offered a mild bid in the four then three paths into the stretch and finished clear for second. NOT TODAY chased the winner inside the runner up and was outfinished two wide. ANOINTED OF GOD saved ground past the quarter pole, drifted to the four path at the top of the stretch, dropped back to the rail through mid stretch and finished evenly. LUNA PRIMAVERA well placed, had good early speed then faded. FREEDOM SAKE trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Not Today
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Kateryna
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, clear second 3path

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom Sake
ENTRY.OWNER: Pepe Lesvyn and Chuncho Bravo Stable & Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Primavera
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, good early speed, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Anointed of God
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Kachow
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, much the best,
